We led the national fight for tax uniformity and we‚Äôre the only state that can‚Äôt benefit. Senate Bill 1 will change that.
I‚Äôm proposing we create a new sales tax license for marketplace providers to make tax collections more efficient for online sellers and the state.
I am also proposing HB 1001 which will clarify the start date of the next governor and allow for a clear transfer of authority.
I don‚Äôt call a special session lightly. Our time spent here today will be well worth it if we can finally even the playing field for all who do business in our state. #sdleg
Thank you to legislators for passing SB1 and SB2 today. These bills secure our Supreme Court victory for marketplace fairness.

I congratulate @DustyJohnson on his election to the U.S. House of Representatives.  I was proud to have Dusty as my chief of staff, and I will be very proud to have him as my representative in Washington.
